description: Nepal Telecom introduces 4G/LTE, a mobile communications standard intended to replace 3G, allowing wireless Internet access at a much higher speed. 4G and LTE are two common terms used for the same technology. This technology supports much higher speeds than previous technologies, providing a better internet browsing experience, uninterrupted video streaming at higher definition, and faster data transfer.

slogans: Enjoy the fast internet speed – 4G/ LTE is here
Be ahead of time, Subscribe to 4G/LTE the latest in global mobile technology
Upload, Download, Share and stay connected – Be Ahead
Now at a much higher speed – Use NT 4G/LTE
First Time in Nepal – Cutting edge global technology at your fingertip
Try it now to feel the difference.
It will be an experience you will remember.

purpose: For Activating 4G/LTE Service and checking SIM compatibility
configuration: Subscription to 4G/LTE service and configuring it in your handset is easy. In case of any confusion, feel free to contact our customer care center.

availability_status: Extensive reach across all 77 districts, encompassing 741 out of 753 local bodies
coverage_list_note: List of 4G coverage in all the provinces and its local bodies is available
expansion_plans: Plans to further extend 4G/LTE services to cover the remaining local bodies in the near future

device: Your mobile device needs to support 4G/LTE
sim_card: If you have an older version of SIM card, you will need to replace it with a newer 4G enabled SIM (Universal SIM i.e. U-SIM)
sim_compatibility_check: Dial *444# to check whether your SIM card supports 4G/LTE

note: As 4G/LTE enables you to browse data at much higher speeds, you will have a much better browsing experience and your data consumption will go up.
recommendation: It is advisable that you buy a data pack which is appropriate for you – use data pack and save money.

office: Contact your nearest Nepal Telecom Office
customer_care: Feel free to contact our customer care center in case of any confusion regarding subscription or configuration.
